description:
Bring fast driving experience to a whole new level! Race the traffic! Be the king of street racing!

JDM Tuner Racing is the game you have been waiting for to speed through the streets and let your potential flow.
Drag race and enjoy the opportunity to customize your air filter, exhaust, ECU, intake, head, pistons, turbo, gearbox, nitrous, tires and others.
The game lets you be in charge of the transmission so you can discover the underground in your own tuning. You chose the make, the color and all other details for your car so you can level up, earn money, and unlock more available features.
Once you start playing and emerge more and more within the game, you start discovering the world of vinyl wheels, car wars and a great variety of engines.
Customize your cars and boost your race winnings with cool custom paint, plates and decals. Get a grasp of the cool graphics in breathtaking 2D urban environments with amazing sound & light effects.

- A lot of JDM Cars!
- Great Detalization!
- Performance Upgrades!
- Engine and Transmission Tune!
- Body Tuning!
- Wheels, Bumpers, Wings, Spoilers, Neon!
- Paint Shop and Decals/Stickers!
- Player Level, Experience, Bonuses!
- Realistic Car Sounds, Physics!
name: JDM Drag Racing Car Driving Simulator 2022 Games
intro: Be the king of the streets by winning races against your opponent's! A lot of visual upgrades for your cars.Improve your car performance-wise by installing new parts.
